text_block_list.name: Sky & Fuji
text_block_list.text: Hahh… hahh… haaah…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirls
text_block_list.text:
Aaaaaaah～～～!! 
They're so coooool～～～!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Wow, that came out of nowhere! 
It's not what I was expecting, but…!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
Hey, why don't we try dancing like that? 
I'm kinda curious how you would lead, y'know?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: I-I'll do my best!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Looks like we lit a flame in everyone. 
Our surprise was a complete success! 
Which means…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Now it's everyone's turn to be the star! It's party time!

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Hey, did Rudolf show them how to do that?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
Huh? 
Dunno. Pretty sure they did it all by themselves?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
They danced how they wanted and got everybody else 
involved too. With the rhythm they had going, can't blame 'em.

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie B
text_block_list.text:
So, the person who asked for the DJ was actually me… 
Sorry!

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
Why apologize to me? 
You've got nothing to do with my relationship to her.

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie B
text_block_list.text:
That's… not what I mean. 
I wanted to apologize for being weak. 
I couldn't decide, and kept running in circles.

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie B
Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
I guess my view was too narrow. 
This place belongs to more than just her. 
And besides…

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Yo, you're !monad, right?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: How do you know my friggin'…

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
Ha, you opened up quick. I'm surprised. You made your social 
media icon a math formula. Your laptop came to mind… It 
smelled the same to me. Guess I was right?

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
You always wander around the course holding that computer. And 
you stick out like a sore thumb, so I remembered. She asked you 
to do a DJ gig, I bet. It's almost time… Or maybe you turned 
her down?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: It's got nothing to do with you.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Maybe you didn't even respond. I'm shocked you didn't refuse on the spot. Hmm, guess you aren't as sharp as you look?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
Is this how you get under people's skin? You're smart, I'll give 
you that. Oh, I get it now! You must be one of my fans!

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
Dunno. What I do know is that somebody wanted you here, 
But you couldn't even make a decision. That's all I'm gonna say.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
Pretty lame if you ask me. You get it, I'm sure. Your silence 
isn't a response. You're just running away. If you don't want 
your identity exposed for everyone… Make a decision. Right 
here, right now.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Why are you trying so hard to bait me?

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
My pack of girls are pretty cute, you know. 
They've gotten fond of you, so take it seriously.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
Do I look like I'm dressed for it? 
If I go out looking like this, I'll dox myself.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
I'll arrange it, and make sure they squeeze you in for time. 
All you need to do is get ready.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: I just hope your taste in clothes is better than it looks.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
Now, you're a good girl… 
…so don't waste this chance to make a good memory.

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie B
text_block_list.text: Huh? A LANE message from Sirius-senpai? W-Wait, what? Really?!

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie A
text_block_list.text: What, everything okay?

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie B
text_block_list.text: We're going to Sirius-senpai's room, now! We'll grab the stuff she mentioned, and hit the Droite!

text_block_list.name: Student Host
text_block_list.text: And that was our DJ, Helios-san! Thanks for making it lit!

text_block_list.name: Student Host
text_block_list.text:
DJ time's up, but the night's not over yet. Right, guys? 
We've got an unexpected special appearance by an anonymous DJ!

text_block_list.name: Student Host
text_block_list.text: Up next is… Um, the exclamation point is silent, right? !monad-san! Come on up!!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: What am I doing here? Her threat was baseless, and I knew that. I turned up my nose at falling for excuses, but I did it too. But why?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
For someone like me? There's no logic to it. Have I been infected 
by Sky and Fuji? Am I gonna excite the crowd? Is that what I 
want? Like hell I do.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
I always liked music. But when I started making it… I was just 
messing around. It was a good way to shut out the annoying parts 
of reality. That's all.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
But, sound is easier to work with than reality. 
So, until the noise ringing in my head disappeared, 
I'd layer sounds, again, and again…

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
I honestly just vomited it out. I didn't make it for anyone to 
listen to. More like, I wanted to give it all the middle finger. 
If I could manage that…

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie B
text_block_list.text: This song rocks! !monad, keep 'em coming!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: No more bull and deliberating. Memories? Lame. I'll turn up the volume, let the music shake the walls, and make this a trauma none of you will ever forget!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I'm glad everyone is smiling. The music is… a little intense for 
my taste, though. I guess we'll have a DJ again next year… What 
are those girls doing?

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie A
text_block_list.text:
Nice, we made it just in time… 
Wait, why are you crying?!

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie B
text_block_list.text: S-Sorry… It's just, she's so friggin' cool! Yeah, I love this. I just love the way !monad's music pounds in my ears!

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie A
text_block_list.text:
C'mon, let's make the most of this. 
We'll jam and go as crazy as we want. 
But first, we've gotta get these dresses on.

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie B
text_block_list.text:
Yeah… Sure! 
It's a date, okay?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
…I see now. What started as my own satisfaction… 
…has turned into this wonderful sight before me.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
But this isn't the time to get distracted. I wasn't able to reach 
the ideal number of students participating. I'll need to think of 
fresh plans to make the next one a success.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I have to make sure every single student is having a good time. 
So not a soul is left out.
